component.name: Immersion
component.summary: Write the language you want, everywhere

description.p: If you are learning a new language and you want to write it everywhere, even if the receivers do not speak it, Immersion can help you.
It allows you to write in your language and automatically translates it to the language of the receiver, so they can understand you.
Additionally, it corrects your mistakes so you can look back and learn from them.

ul.li: Translation from any language to any other language
